message:
Your post on /r/explainlikeimfive, [%s](%s), has received many responses. If you feel that your question has been adequately answered, click [here](%s) and hit "send" to mark it as answered or do it manually.

 **I am a bot. Please do not respond to me other than through the [mark answered](%s) link above.** 

 If you wish to communicate with the ELI5 moderators, [click here](%s).
messagesubject: Has your ELI5 post been answered?
